title: OUTBACK THRESH SKIN!!
body:
OUTBACK THRESH SKIN   {{champion:412}} 

I don't have many ideas other than a whip or lasso for his weapon.
An outback styled lantern
The souls can be little fireflies that are different colours (according to real firefly colours)
His body would be like an old dusty skeleton wearing a hat and cowboy clothes

Please feel free to make any suggestions belowwwww!!

Penger OUT!

replies.body: Instead of a lantern maybe a billy would do suffice (not the kind of billy a stoner would think of immediately either)

His Hook is a Lasso.

I win the internet.
